page.title: 16A policeman's day in Dalston
page.content: 5.00pm Mr Blaire started work. 5.10 Mr Blaire renewed a gun licence and checked the number on the gun and the licence then counted the number of bullets. 5.20 Mr Blaire told someone to come to court. 5.30 Mr Blaire went to Wigton police station and gave a statement of a fatal accident. 6.30 Mr Blaire left Wigton police station. 7.00 Mr Blaire went to a house at Nine Rigg and asked about an accident in another part of the country and told him he was to be procecuted. 7.25 Mr Blaire went to Glebe close where some boys had got into a newly built house. 7.30 Mr Blaire arived at Glebe close and saw 4 boys (see page 17)
